00015 #define register

00017 #include <math.h>

00019 #include <string.h>
00020 #include <iostream>
00021 #include <sys/types.h>
00022 #include <time.h>
00023 
00024 
00025 typedef int Element;
00026 
00028 // Quick and dirty generator from Numerical recipes
00029 typedef unsigned int Card32;
00030 
00031 #define rand32() (ran32State = 1664525 * ran32State + 1013904223)
00032 #define randUniform() ((double)rand32() * (0.5 / 0x80000000))
00033 
00034 // return random int between 0 and k-1
00035 #define rand0K(k) ((int)(randUniform() * k))
00036 
00037 
00038 register Card32 ran32State = time (NULL);
00039 
00041 void
00042 knuthPerm (register Element * input, int n)
00043 {
00044         register double nDouble = (double) n;
00045         register Element temp;
00046         register Element *beyond = input + n - 1;
00047         register Element *other;
00048 
00049         for (; input < beyond; input++, nDouble--)
00050         {
00051                 other = input + rand0K (nDouble);
00052                 temp = *input;
00053                 *input = *other;
00054                 *other = temp;
00055         }
00056 }
00057 
00058 #endif
